dEqvA vai rA#jaqnyA$-jjAya#mAnA-dabiBayuq-stamaqntarEqva santaqM dAmnA &pau$mBaqnth sa vA EqShO&pO$bdhO jAyatEq yad-rA#jaqnyO# yadvA EqShO&na#pObdhOq jAyE#ta vRuqtrAn Gna(gg) Sca#rEqdyaM kAqmayE#ta rAjaqnya#mana#pObdhO jAyEta vRuqtrAn Gna(gg) Sca#rEqditiq tasmA# Eqtamai$ndrA bAr.haspaqtyaM caqruM nirva#pEdaiqndrO vai rA#jaqnyO$ brahmaq bRuhaqspatiq rbrahma#NaiqvainaqM ( ) dAmnOq&pOMBa#nAn mu~jcati hiraqNmayaqM dAmaq dakShi#NA sAqkShAdEqvainaqM dAmnOq&pOMBa#nAn mu~jcati || 43
(EqnaqM - dvAda#Sa ca) (A13)
